Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi

It\'s been a difficult time for a galaxy far away. The world is ruled by a tyrannical empire. There are almost no pure hearts left, endowed with the power of Jedi, who fight evil and injustice. And yet there are those who dare to resist the universal dictatorship and cruelty: the rebels are few, but they are strong in spirit, strong in hope.

The mysterious planet Dagobar is home to the young lightsaber knight Luke Skywalker for a while. Wise Master Yoda trains the young Jedi, giving the student some of his own extensive knowledge and skills. But it is impossible for Luke to stay in the beautiful jungle: his friends are again captured by the vengeful Sith Darth Vader.

The monstrous smuggler Jabba Hutt has captured Khan Solo. To help his friend rush to the aid of matured Luke Skywalker, the brave Princess Leia, faithful droids and other loyal supporters of the Resistance. Meanwhile, treacherous Darth Vader hurries to create a second, more powerful \"Death Star\" to destroy the rebels and their comrades-in-arms across the galaxy once and for all.
